Package com.opencqrs.framework.serialization

Class JacksonEventDataMarshaller

java.lang.Object
com.opencqrs.framework.serialization.JacksonEventDataMarshaller
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventDataMarshaller
public class JacksonEventDataMarshaller extends Object implements EventDataMarshaller
EventDataMarshaller implementation that uses a configurable ObjectMapper for marshalling.
